title: Inquire About Missing Application Document
description: An applicant received an email that their application is incomplete and wants to know what is missing.

tasks.description: Check the application checklist in the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the 'Official High School Transcript' is marked as not received.

tasks.description: Inform the applicant which document is missing and explain how to submit it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the missing item and submission instructions.
